message.entry: To connect to the ROS device, specify its address, your username, and your password. The generated ROS node will be deployed in the given Catkin workspace folder.
IP address or hostname of the device.
Username used for logging into the device.
Password used for logging into the device.
The root folder of the installed ROS distribution on the device.
Generated ROS nodes will be built in this workspace folder on the device.
If selected, the password is stored persistently. The password is saved in plain-text.
Test the validity of the device settings.
The root folder of the installed ROS 2 distribution on the device.
Generated ROS 2 nodes will be built in this workspace folder on the device.
Expected SSH port to be numeric. Instead found ''{0}''.
